original_title: The Return of Tanya Tucker Featuring Brandi Carlile
overview: Trailblazing, hell-raising country music legend Tanya Tucker defied the standards of how a woman in country music was supposed to behave. Decades after Tanya slipped from the spotlight, rising Americana music star Brandi Carlile takes it upon herself to write an entire album for her hero based on Tanyaâ€™s extraordinary life, spurring the greatest comeback in country music history. Taking stock of the past while remaining vitally alive in the present and keeping an eye on the future, The Return of Tanya Tucker is a rousing exploration of an unexpected friendship built on the joy of a perfectly timed creative collaboration.
tagline: A trailblazing, hell-raising, music legend. A genre-defining musical force of nature. An unexpected friendship that led to the greatest comeback in country music history.
title: The Return of Tanya Tucker Featuring Brandi Carlile
